name: a3-part2-will
description: In assignment 3 you created a chatbot from a movie database.  In this group project (no more than 4 people in a group, or you can work individually) you are tasked to create your own chatbot for something that is more relavant to you.  You can use our solution as a starting point for your own chatbot, or you could do something completely different.
author: Will Otwell, Louis Woodley
